Digital Watch: Fashionable sporty dial design. Large Dial and numbers with light, show time clear in the dark. Use import EL Lamp, easy to see the time clearly in the light, easy to read. Larger than usual watch
Men’s Watch: Appeals to men, especially to those who like doing sports, shock resistant, stopwatch,12/24H time mode, and LED backlight functions to make it perfect for all kinds of sport and daily use.
Sports Watch: Shock Resistant, perfect for both outdoor and indoor sports, such as running, climbing, fishing, etcShock Resistant, perfect for both outdoor and indoor sports, such as running, climbing, fishing, etc
Multifunction Watch: Auto Date, Alarm, Water Resistant, LED display, Shock Resistant, Stop Watch, Back Light
Waterproof: 164 Ft / 50 M water resist, Please DO NOT press any buttons underwater, and in case of damaging waterproof ring, please keep it away from steam and hot water.

item.title: 12V Car Battery Tester, TOPDON BT20 Battery Load Tester, Voltage Test Digital Alternator Tester, Cranking&Charging Test via App, Budget Automotive Battery Analyzer&Checker for Car Truck SUV ATV Boat
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand TOPDON, Your Ideal Car Helper TOPDON BT20 Battery Tester 2022 Budget Car Battery Tester Basic function: voltage and load test Extra function(with APP): Cranking and Charging Test TOPDON-Your Helper in Diagnose Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 5.67 x 3.27 inches; 12.35 Ounces Item model number ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:45 UTC – Details)

From the brand

TOPDON, Your Ideal Car Helper

TOPDON BT20 Battery Tester

2022 Budget Car Battery Tester

Basic function: voltage and load test

Extra function(with APP): Cranking and Charging Test

TOPDON-Your Helper in Diagnose

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 5.67 x 3.27 inches; 12.35 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ TOPDON BT20 Car Battery Tester
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 5, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ TT TOPDON
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B5T7212M
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

【A Budget-Friendly Car Battery Tester】As a battery tester below 30 bucks, it features 4 testing modes: battery load tester (range 10V-20V), voltage test, cranking test, and charging test (alternator tester), the latter 2 test modes are availabe only with APP, offering you more value for the money. NOTE: For 12V lead-acid batteries. NOTE: It doesn’t measure CCA.
【Fast&Accurate Diagnosis within 1 Second】Simply click the TEST button, and get the testing results within 1 second. This battery tester will display the battery life by way of Low/Medium/High. Adopting the latest conductivity testing technology (up to 99.5% test accuracy). Thus, it makes a great choice for users who want to get results quickly. NOTE: It doesn’t measure CCA.
【Expanded Voltage, Cranking, and Charging Tests with APP】Easily connect to this car battery tester via Bluetooth to get additional cranking, charging, and voltage testing capabilities. Easily view real-time voltage waveform graphs with data playback functionality.
【Comprehensive Vehicle Coverage & Multi-Language Support】Plug & play operation. Simply connect the testing clamps to the battery and you are ready to analyze. This 12V battery tester works on a variety of vehicles with 12V Lead-acid batteries such as boats, motorcycles, ships, and trucks. Also this auto battery tester easily switches between 8 different languages.
【Ideal Car Tool for Every Car Owner】Reverse polarity and “no spark” protection for extra safety. Long 19.75″ clamp leads allow testing from inside or outside the vehicle. A perfect battery analyzer and load tester for small repair shops & car owners alike. Makes a great gift for car enthusiasts.
【8 HOUR TECH SUPPORT HOTLINE】TOPDON provides 2 Year Warranty for all products. In case of any inquiries, please feel free to contact us at 833-956-8335 Monday-Friday 9:00AM-6PM Eastern Time.

BT20 BATTERY LOAD TESTER

The BT20 is TOPDON’s entry-level wireless 12V battery tester. Offering load, voltage, charging, and cranking tests, the BT20 offers high-precision voltage detection and real-time voltage monitoring.

This easy-to-use device lets users of all skill-levels view voltage waveform graphs and test reports through an app. Test reports can be generated automatically, and easily share and save test reports. Data Playback function query battery voltage history data, help users analyze the problem by playing back charge and discharge data reports.

Its load test method provides accurate results, making the BT20 a battery tester with superb cost-effectiveness.

Quick access to test results in the app by linking your phone via Bluetooth.

Run Charging Tests: Test a battery’s charging performance with the app and analyze the results.

Run Cranking Tests: Test the battery through the load of the car itself, and view the results in the app.

Voltage Test:

Further analyze the battery’s health through its voltage, and predict the battery’s power status with the results of the BT20. Three kinds of indicator lights communicate the battery level, full, medium, and low.

Load Test:

Built-in load modules help determine the status of the battery.

Multi-Dimensional Display of Battery Status

No-load and load voltage readings can be displayed in the APP, and there is a real-time voltage waveform graph for accurate monitoring.

Battery Load Test

The BT20 applies load tests and monitors the voltage response of the battery. Users gain a clearer look at the actual remaining battery capacity.

Battery Voltage Test

Once the clamps are connected to the terminals, the BT20 delivers the battery voltage results in the blink of an eye.

Cranking Test

The cranking test measures the battery’s cranking voltage and cranking time when starting up. Normally, the cranking voltage should be above 9.6V. As for the cranking time, The shorter, the better!

Read more

Charging Test

The charging test measures the no-load voltage and load voltage, which helps you to understand the battery charging status, and alternator performance.

Supports 8 Languages to Maximize Utility

English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese

A Wide Range of Tests with Highly Accurate Results

The BT20 is designed for versatility. With a variety of testing capabilities, analysis tools, and a battery range of 5 to 20 volts, the tool delivers highly accurate result.

Read more

4.5
Price: $35.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:45 UTC – Details)

Product Description

For over 30 years, Supersonic is a manufacturer in Consumer and Mobile Electronics. Success has been derived from our core mission statement: To provide Design, Value and Quality products, which ensure years of ultimate entertainment experience for our consumers.

We strive to offer innovative and quality products that fit into every individual lifestyle. With collaboration from our partners, suppliers and customers, Supersonic is continuously making an effort to satisfy the consumer’s current electronic needs.

SuperSonic LED Widescreen HDTV SERIES

Enjoy stunning picture quality and feel like your right in the middle of the action with this LED HDTV.

SuperSonic HDTV brings you a crisp 1080p picture quality for stunning detail and contrast. The colors projected from the monitor contains a spectrum of vibrant colors. Enjoy your shows almost anywhere! Our TVs are designed to be perfect for any location, such as your kitchen or desk. It is also the perfect size for any RV owner! Our TVs contain HDMI, USB, and AC/DC ports. This feature allows you to freely use your Firestick or similar hardware to browse thousands of channels and apps such as Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Showtime, and more. SuperSonic HDTV is compatible with Amazon Firestick and many others such as video game consoles. Built-in ports makes this a versatile system. With PC inputs our TV’s allows you to use your TV as a computer monitor. The screen size and resolution make for a great PC experience!

What’s in the Box:

Remote ControlAC Power AdapterUser Manual

COMPATIBILITY: SuperSonic HDTV is compatible with Amazon Firestick and many others such as video game consoles. Built-in ports makes this a versatile system.
PC INPUT: This feature allows you to use your TV as a computer monitor. The screen size and resolution make for a great PC experience.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $11.99 - $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:31:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Welcome to write to us if you have any problem.

Premium Material: Won’t scratch your valuable objects when measuring, serve you for years.

Accurate Reading: Strictly tested to ensure exact measurements which accurate to 0.01 inch.

Zero Calibration: Press to set to zero at any position and continue to measure next section.

Unit Conversion: Easy to read in inches and mm by pressing the blue button on the top.

Large LCD Display: Shows instant readings with digital numbers, much more convenient.

Auto On/Off: Auto turns on when sliding, auto turns off after 5mins if with no operation.

4 Ways of Measurement

-External Measuring: Measuring the outer diameter of objects with the long jaws.

-Internal Measuring: Measuring the inner diameter of objects with the top jaws.

-Depth Measuring: Measuring the depth of hard-to-reach small objects with the long probe.

-Step Measuring: Measuring the height/length with its step design.

CAUTION

1. Before first use, please remove the white insulation strip in the battery cover, or the electronic caliper cannot work.

2. The digital caliper is only for household measurement, such as jewelry, gadgets and other household objects.

If for industrial measurement, please buy a more professional and more accurate measuring tool in professional field.

3. If you find the readings are not accurate, please slide the LCD screen to the left end (“0” on the scale), and then press the zero button. Welcome to write to us for more questions.

Specifications:

Material: Carbon Fiber Composites

Size: 9.4 x 3 x 0.6in

Weight: 2oz

Measuring Range: 0-6 inches/0-150mm

Accuracy: ±0.2mm/0.01”

Resolution: 0.01”/0.1mm

Battery: 1.5V LR44 button cell

Package

1 x Digital Caliper + 2 x Batteries

Precise measurement: Measurement range: 0 – 6”/ 0 – 150mm; Resolution: 0.01”/ 0.1mm; Accuracy: ±0.2mm/0.01”. Perfect and accurate caliper measuring tool for household/DIY measurement. Please choose stainless steel digital caliper for more accurate measuring
4 measuring modes: This digital caliper can be used to Measure inside and outside diameter, depth and step with two sets of jaws and a probe. Powered by battery, comes with a pre-installed battery and a spare battery
Inch/mm conversion: One button quick switch between two units: inch and millimeter, definitely save your time. Made of rugged plastic carbon fiber composites, durable and portable
Zero setting function: The smart design allows you to set zero with an easy touch of a button and start a new measurement at any point of the scale, ideal for differential measuring
Large LCD screen & auto off: The large and easy-to-read LCD display helps you get precise results quickly and easily, auto shutdown for saving battery after 5 minutes if without operation

Read more

Large LCD Display: Shows instant readings with digital numbers, much more convenient.

Auto On/Off: Auto turns on when sliding, auto turns off after 5mins if with no operation.

4 Ways of Measurement

-External Measuring: Measuring the outer diameter of objects with the long jaws.

-Internal Measuring: Measuring the inner diameter of objects with the top jaws.

-Depth Measuring: Measuring the depth of hard-to-reach small objects with the long probe.

-Step Measuring: Measuring the height/length with its step design.

CAUTION

1. Before first use, please remove the white insulation strip in the battery cover, or the electronic caliper cannot work.

2. The digital caliper is only for household measurement, such as jewelry, gadgets and other household objects.

If for industrial measurement, please buy a more professional and more accurate measuring tool in professional field.

3. If you find the readings are not accurate, please slide the LCD screen to the left end (“0” on the scale), and then press the zero button. Welcome to write to us for more questions.

Specifications:

Material: Carbon Fiber Composites

Size: 9.4 x 3 x 0.6in

Weight: 2oz

Measuring Range: 0-6 inches/0-150mm

Accuracy: ±0.2mm/0.01”

Resolution: 0.01”/0.1mm

Battery: 1.5V LR44 button cell

Package

1 x Digital Caliper + 2 x Batteries

4 measuring modes: This digital caliper can be used to Measure inside and outside diameter, depth and step with two sets of jaws and a probe. Powered by battery, comes with a pre-installed battery and a spare battery
Inch/mm conversion: One button quick switch between two units: inch and millimeter, definitely save your time. Made of rugged plastic carbon fiber composites, durable and portable
Zero setting function: The smart design allows you to set zero with an easy touch of a button and start a new measurement at any point of the scale, ideal for differential measuring
Large LCD screen & auto off: The large and easy-to-read LCD display helps you get precise results quickly and easily, auto shutdown for saving battery after 5 minutes if without operation

Product Description

FAQs

Does it require Internet?

Yes, Photoshare Frames need to be online in order to recieve new photos. However, photos can also be uploaded manually via SD card or USB thumb drive if you prefer

Who can send photos?

Frame owners can share their Frame ID or email address with all their family and friends. There is no limit!

How many photos will it hold?

PhotoShare Frames have 8GB of storage and hold 5,000+ photos

Are there fees or subscriptions?

No! There are no fees or subscriptions to use or send photos to PhotShare Frames. Even the PhotoShare Frame app is free.

How is it powered?

PhotoShare Frames need to be plugged in to use and enjoy. Each frame comes with an A/C power adapter and there is a USB port if you prefer to use a USB cord.

Easily send photos and video clips from phones to frames in seconds with the free PhotoShare Frame App, Email, Facebook, or Google Photos
Smart Digital Photo Frame with 10.1″ vibrant HD Touchscreen Display
WiFi enabled to receive photos from anywhere, anytime – keeping you connected to loved ones, no matter how far
Quick & Easy one-minute setup
No fees – invite all your friends and family to share photos too!
